downloadTitle: MVP Session 19: Create Flowcharts and Swim Lane Diagrams in Visio 2010 (working files)
downloadDescription: Practice working with enhancements for standard and cross-functional (“swimlane” diagram) flowcharts in Microsoft Visio 2010 with these diagrams, part of the Visio 2010 MVP Sessions, Video 19.
detailsSection: Practice working with enhancements for standard and cross-functional (“swimlane” diagram) flowcharts in Visio 2010 with these diagrams, created as companions to the Visio 2010 MVP Sessions (http://visio.microsoft.com/MVPSessions), Video 19. MVP Sessions Video 19 covers several simplified diagramming features of Visio 2010, such as visual indicators when shapes are aligned and evenly spaced, autoconnect triangles and the quick shape menu for adding connectors or shapes with a single click, and containers for managing swim lane diagrams. Use these working files to follow along with the video and practice creating cross-functional diagrams and using swimlanes to easily organize shapes.
installInstructionSection: Click Download to save the working files to your computer and then open them with Visio 2010.
additionalInformationSection: Watch the Create Flowcharts and Swim Lane Diagrams video (http://visio.microsoft.com/en-us/Get_Started/How_To/Pages/Session-19-Create-flowcharts-and-swim-lane-diagrams.aspx).
